overview: The Contact Us page for Digital Experience Healthcare provides a responsive, accessible form for users to submit inquiries, along with contact details, success/error banners, and FAQ content. It includes navigation, theme toggle, and validation-ready form fields with ARIA support.
key_components: Hero section with title and subtitle
interactions: Theme toggle button switches between light and dark modes
Form fields validate required inputs and email format
Submit button enables only when required fields are valid
Success banner appears after successful submission
Error banner appears on failed submission
Banners can be dismissed via close buttons
Character count updates dynamically in message field
data_flow: User inputs captured in form fields
Submit triggers async request (likely POST) to backend endpoint
Response toggles visibility of success or error banners
Form reset or disabled state managed post-submission
accessibility: Skip to content link for keyboard navigation
ARIA roles and labels on navigation, banners, and form fields
aria-live regions for validation and alert messages
aria-required and aria-describedby attributes for form inputs
Keyboard focus management for dismissible banners
analytics: Track form submission success and failure events
Track FAQ link clicks (e.g., More Information link)
test_ideas: Verify skip-to-content link focuses main content
Validate theme toggle persists mode across reloads
Ensure form validation messages appear for empty or invalid fields
Confirm submit button enables only when required fields are valid
Simulate successful submission and verify success banner visibility
Simulate failed submission and verify error banner visibility
Test banner close buttons hide alerts and restore focus
Check character count updates correctly in message field
Validate ARIA attributes and roles for accessibility compliance
Verify navigation links route correctly and active state updates
